info.name: Formation Management API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Formation module including Formations, Apprenants, Classes, Formateurs, Contenus, Objectifs, Examens, and all related resources

request.description: Get formation statistics including participants, certifications, etc.
Get a specific formation by ID

body.raw:
{
  "titre": "Advanced Java Programming",
  "description": "Comprehensive formation on advanced Java concepts",
  "domainId": 1,
  "dureeJours": 5,
  "nbParticipantsMax": 30
}

{
  "titre": "Advanced Java Programming - Updated",
  "description": "Comprehensive formation on advanced Java concepts with examples",
  "domainId": 1,
  "dureeJours": 6,
  "nbParticipantsMax": 35
}

request.description: Create a complete copy of a formation with all its objectives and contents
Link a global objective to a formation
Unlink a global objective from a formation
Link a specific objective to a formation
Unlink a specific objective from a formation
Upload an image for a formation (JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP - max 5MB)

query.description: Email of the apprenant to verify
Matricule of the apprenant to verify

request.description: Verify if an apprenant exists by email or matricule. Returns exists: true/false and apprenant details if found.
Get all apprenants for a specific training plan
Get all classes/courses an apprenant is enrolled in. Returns class details including formation info.
Check if an apprenant is enrolled in a specific class. Returns enrolled: true/false and class details if enrolled.
Get all apprenants for a specific formation
Get apprenants for a formation with pagination
Generate a new password for an apprenant
Import multiple apprenants from a CSV file

item.name: Classes

request.description: Get all classes for a formation
Get all classes for a plan formation
Get all currently active classes (based on access date range)
Get all classes with available spots
Create a new class with access date range
Toggle active/inactive status of a class
Add an apprenant to a class
Remove an apprenant from a class
Add multiple apprenants to a class at once
Get all classes for an apprenant
Get classes statistics (total count, active count)

item.description: Classes management with access date control and apprenant enrollment

request.description: Get all global contents for a formation
Get all detailed contents for a formation
Upload a file for detailed content

item.name: Supporting Data
item.description: Supporting data for formations (domains, types, categories)

variable.description: Base URL of the API server
